			StaticText 'Our secondary font,'

			StaticText ', may be too thin for people with low-vision. We should investigate fonts that have similar characteristics, but have heavier weights.'

				[1451] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1456] button 'Reply to comment'

				[1484] paragraph ''
					[1485] emphasis ''
						StaticText 'Created by: missmatsuko'
				[1486] link "that a11y isn't just a hash tag, nor is it a hip way to spell ally. Rather a11y is", url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/uploads/c346e918cd78f1eb4422f6b810ef0761/87834338-ff998480-c83e-11ea-99c5-12da2536d8a0.png'
					[1487] image "that a11y isn't just a hash tag, nor is it a hip way to spell ally. Rather a11y is", url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/uploads/c346e918cd78f1eb4422f6b810ef0761/87834338-ff998480-c83e-11ea-99c5-12da2536d8a0.png'
				[1488] paragraph ''
					StaticText "I don't know if it's worth looking at, but the digit"
					[1489] code ''
						StaticText '1'
					StaticText 'and the lowercase letter'
					[1490] code ''
						StaticText 'l'
					StaticText 'in Noto Serif look very similar. I found it hard to read this text saying'
					[1491] code ''
						StaticText 'a11y'
					StaticText "isn't"
					[1492] code ''
						StaticText 'ally'
					StaticText '.'
			[1495] listitem ''

						[1614] code ''

					StaticText ", but of course Chrome hasn't supported it yet."
